00001 <?php
00002         require_once(dirname(__FILE__) . "/email.php");
00003         
00008         class ContactEmail extends Email
00009         {
00010                 const default_subject = 'Messaggio dal sito Emeraldion.it da parte di ';
00011                 
00016                 public $URL;
00017                 
00023                 public function ContactEmail($params)
00024                 {
00025                         $this->name = $params['name'];
00026                         $this->email = $params['email'];
00027                         $this->subject = !empty($params['subject']) ?
00028                                 $params['subject'] : (self::default_subject . $params['name']);
00029                         $this->URL = $params['URL'];
00030                         $this->recipient = self::default_recipient;
00031                         $this->headers = "From: {$params['name']}<{$params['email']}>";
00032                         $this->text = get_magic_quotes_gpc() ? stripslashes($params['text']) : $params['text'];
00033                         $this->date = date("d/m/Y H:i:s");
00034                 }
00035                 
00040                 public function make_text()
00041                 {
00042                         return <<<EOT
00043 Da: {$this->name}
00044 Email: {$this->email}
00045 URL: {$this->URL}
00046 IP: {$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']}
00047 User Agent: {$_SERVER['HTTP_USER_AGENT']}
00048 Data: {$this->date}
00049 
00050 {$this->text}
00051 
00052 -- 
00053 Emeraldion Lodge
00054 http://www.emeraldion.it
00055 
00056 EOT;
00057                 }
00058         }

00060 ?>
